arStrings.szText: Answers in the Ashes
I returned to the wagon but Cormond and his horse have gone. It seems he’s left me a note...
Read Note from Cormond
Cormond’s note said that he found something under Orbei. I should meet him outside the monastery and see what this is about.
Find Cormond at the Orbei Monastery
I have held the Malignant at bay yet their spread continues. I should return to Cormond's wagon and hope his search has borne fruit.
Investigate Cormond's wagon
Speak with Cormond
Cormond has found a Hall of Records under the ruins of Orbei. It may contain knowledge about this "cure.” I will escort him through the crypt and see for myself.
Enter the Crypts of Orbei
I found Cormond outside the crypts of Orbei, thankfully unharmed. I must ask him how he knows this powerful new Malignant.
Speak to Cormond

We found a lead pointing to Hawezar but a powerful Malignant attacked. It called Cormond by name. When I tried to capture it, the cage exploded and it escaped. I must look for Cormond outside. He clearly knows more than he has said.
Find Cormond outside the Crypts of Orbei
I found Cormond outside the crypts of Orbei, thankfully unharmed. I must ask him how he knows this powerful new Malignant.
Speak to Cormond
I found Cormond outside the crypts of Orbei, thankfully unharmed. I must ask him how he knows this powerful new Malignant.
Speak to Cormond
Malignant have swarmed Cormond’s wagon but thankfully he wasn't there. I should deal with them then search for Cormond.
Defeat the Malignant Ambush
